events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I ordered.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the incorrect item delivered to the customer.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer’s incorrect order.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo of the incorrect item that arrived at my address.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund immediately and you should receive the amount back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear solution. I appreciate the fast handling of my refund.
Your refund case has been resolved successfully. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution provided.
The case has now been closed after confirming the refund was received and the customer is satisfied with the outcome.
